name: Mortal Dripping Raindrops
description:
Running in the rain was never more difficult!

#MortalDripping is the game that will keep you frustrated, and yet entertained for a lot of time :)

It's the next game you will be addicted of!
So how far can you go up? #mortaldripping

Features:

• Amazing One-Touch Platformer
• Modern and Minimalistic Art
• Pleasent Soundtrack
• Beat Friends, Family, and Team Mates in Game Center Leaderboards!

How to Play:

Tap anywhere on the screen to begin your mortal dripping run.

Hide under umbrellas, and avoid raindrops as much as you can!
